sentences.en: Beneath its surface glitter, the fashion industry is a tough place to work in.
sentences.cn: 时装业表面上光彩迷人, 但其实是个辛苦的行业.

sentences.en: Bingley fancied the world was fascinated with its glitter.
sentences.cn: 宾利相信,它的光彩足以使全世界着迷.

sentences.en: Decorate the tunic with sequins or glitter.
sentences.cn: 用些圆形小金属片或发光小亮片装饰这件女式短上衣。

sentences.en: Gary Glitter, 48, revealed the secret of his youthful looks.
sentences.cn: 48岁的加里·格利特透露了他青春永驻的秘密。

sentences.en: Hagen saw Sollazzo's face go pale, his eyes glitter with rage.
sentences.cn: 黑根发现索洛佐的脸“刷”一下子变得苍白了, 眼睛也闪烁着愤怒之光.

sentences.en: How beautifully gold brooches glitter on the bosoms of our patriotic women!
sentences.cn: 金光闪闪的别针佩在我国爱国妇女的胸前,多美呀!

sentences.en: She felt the glitter of the visions mounting to her brain.
sentences.cn: 这个梦幻世界放射出的华丽光辉逐渐侵入了她的脑海.

sentences.en: She was blinded by the glitter and the glamour of her own life.
sentences.cn: 她被自己的生活中表面上的光鲜与奢华所蒙蔽。

sentences.en: The child was attracted by the glitter of the Christmas tree decorations.
sentences.cn: 这孩子被圣诞树上闪耀的装饰物吸引住了.

sentences.en: the glitter of his gold cigarette case
sentences.cn: 他那金烟盒发出的亮光

sentences.en: The morning dews glitter in the sun.
The river glittered in the sunlight.
There was a cold glitter in his eyes as he jerked her to her feet.
sentences.cn: 他眼里闪着冷峻的光芒,便一手把她拽了起来.

sentences.en: They sat there with a kind of glitter in their eyes.
sentences.cn: 他们坐在那儿,个个目光灼灼.

sentences.en: You taste just like glitter Mixed with rock and roll.
sentences.cn: 你带著绚丽闪耀的摇滚风味.

sentences.en: Young writers , surf - riders upon nowness, sometimes glitter with talent.
sentences.cn: 在现在瞬间中随潮起伏的青年作家, 有时确实闪耀着才华.

phrases.phrase: all that glitters is not gold

trans.tran_cn: 灿烂的光辉，闪烁，（表面的）诱惑力，吸引力
trans.tran_en: brightness consisting of many flashing points of light
to shine brightly with flashing points of light
to shine brightly with flashing points of light

trans.tran_cn: 闪烁，闪耀，华丽夺目，炫耀
trans.tran_en: to shine brightly with flashing points of light
to shine brightly with flashing points of light
